actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Underwater Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The seahorse's Stealth is 17 while underwater.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.
